body_html: @bddppq @petrex I have used hipifying protobuf hack before, but I am still thinking if it covers every case. If I understand correctly, this needs to be done on model.net and not model.param_init_net and most of the current examples run RunNetOnce on param_init_net.
body_text: @bddppq @petrex I have used hipifying protobuf hack before, but I am still thinking if it covers every case. If I understand correctly, this needs to be done on model.net and not model.param_init_net and most of the current examples run RunNetOnce on param_init_net.
body: @bddppq @petrex I have used hipifying protobuf hack before, but I am still thinking if it covers every case. If I understand correctly, this needs to be done on `model.net` and not `model.param_init_net` and most of the current examples run `RunNetOnce` on `param_init_net`.
